page.title: Cmd Desc
page.t: The Station Storage Extension allows to use the cargo bay of docked ships to extend the stations' storage capacity.\n\nShips that are docked to the station and have it set as their homebase can be turned into storage extensions. They are then used to store wares if the stations' cargo bay usage exceeds a certain amount. If the station runs out of the ware at a later time, the amount stored in the extension ships is used to back it up.

page.title: Txt Res
page.t: The Station Storage Extension allows to use the cargo bay of docked ships to extend the stations' storage capacity.\n\nShips that are docked to the station and have it set as their homebase can be turned into storage extensions. They are then used to store wares if the stations' cargo bay usage exceeds a certain amount. If the station runs out of the ware at a later time, the amount stored in the extension ships is used to back it up.

Here all wares managed by the Storage Extension are diplayed with their respective properties.\nSelect a managed ware to edit its settings.\nSelect a unmanaged ware to add it to the list of managed wares.
Edit the settings by selecting the corresponding menu item.\nYou can assign ships to the ware, in which it will be stored preferably.

Here all ships currently used by the Storage Extension are displayed with their status.\nYou can add ships to the Storage Extension when they are docked at the station and have it set as their homebase.\nAfter a ship has been added to the list, you can undock it again if you wish.

You can configure the Storage Extension to notify you of certain events and wether they are announced acoustically.\nYou can be warned if the load of all docked extension ships exceeds a certain limit.\nAdditionally warnings for the load of a ware's preferred ships can be activated.
Load of Preferred Ships of a Ware: %s%
This will remove the Station Storage Extension from the game.\nAll your settings will be lost in the process.\nProceed?
[author]Station Storage Extension[/author][yellow]Station Storage Extension[/yellow] %s installed successfully.
[author]Station Storage Extension[/author][yellow]Station Storage Extension[/yellow]\n\nUpdate of running Storage Extensions from %s to %s successful.
[author]Station Storage Extension[/author][yellow]Station Storage Extension[/yellow] %s uninstalled successfully.

[author]Station Storage Extension[/author][yellow]Station Storage Extension[/yellow]: [red]Warning![/red]

Subject: Your Station [cyan]%s[/cyan]

The load of all docked extension ships has exceeded the critical level of %s%. According to your wishes you are hereby notified.
You can edit the notification settings in the Storage Extension configuration panel.

[author]Station Storage Extension[/author][yellow]Station Storage Extension[/yellow]: [red]Warning![/red]

Subject: Your Station [cyan]%s[/cyan]

The load of the docked extension ships preferably used for %s has exceeded the critical level of %s%. According to your wishes you are hereby notified.
You can edit the notification settings in the Storage Extension configuration panel.
Multiply the numbers to generate a notification code
Acoustic Alert On, Total Usage Warning On, Preferred Ship Warning Off: 2*3=6
Warning Level Total Cargo Bay Usage
Warning Level Preferred Ships Cargo Bay Usage
